ModMetaData.name: [RH2] Uncle Boris' - Used Furniture
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
"Welcome to the Used Furniture Emporium. If you're looking for Boris, he's in the back." - Ms. Park
Description: The Used Furniture Emporium aims for 100% customer satisfaction. Customers are to expect top of the line, used furniture, restored and refurbished. To special customers who wish for fortifications suitable for a theatre of war, they will have to privately speak to Uncle Boris who may offer discounts on bulk orders.
Boris, he can get you anything you need.
Credits: Taranchuk - C# coding SirLalaPyon - Building art DanDMan68 - Building art JDS - Building art Erok - Fence art AOBA - Wall art Jecrell - C# coding Albion - C# coding Nif - Fence wall .xml coding from Architecture Expanded Jack Wall - Cold War: Bell's Theme soundtrack
Radio Music: Bandit radio - MoozE Alexey Omelchuk Still Alive - Valve Country rock - Valve Latin - Valve Flamenco - Valve "Nostalgic" - Miguel Berkemeier
Supporters: Sheriff
